Mumbai Team
Mumbai cricket team is one of the most successful franchises in the Indian T20 League.  Apart from retaining Rohit Sharma (captain of the team), Jasprit Bumrah, Suryakumar Yadav, and Kieron Pollard, Mumbai  also made some interesting buys at the February auction.

Captain Rohit will again be on top and will be eyeing a record sixth title when his team takes the field from March 27 2022. Mumbai, known for their slow start to the tournament, will look to go ahead with full force from the start this time as the league becomes more competitive with the addition of two new teams.

Kolkata Team
Kolkata Team, the team of Shah Rukh Khan, the superstar, is one of the popular teams of the Indian Cricket League. This franchise cricket team is based in Kolkata, West Bengal. This time, two-time champions Kolkata will enter the Indian Cricket League with a new captain Shreyas Iyer, and they will be eyeing to end the drought of the last eight years.

Mumbai Vs Kolkata- Head to Head Record

Rohit Sharma (43) and Suryakumar Yadav (56), Mumbai, scored 152 runs for 10 wickets in 20 overs, batting first in front of Kolkata, which Kolkata team could not achieve by losing 7 wickets in as many overs. Trent Boult took 2 for 27, and Rahul Chahar took 4 wickets for 27 runs in 4 overs and ruined the hopes of Kolkata.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ Tips For Picking Your Fantasy Team

 

Player Form
Before making the team, the players you choose should be kept in mind, and those players should have good form. Although any player can perform well in a match at any time, those running in good condition are more likely to perform well. Hence, such players can give you more points in fantasy cricket.

All Rounder
The player who takes more points will win the match in the end, so, if you trust the all-rounder players, then maybe they will give you good points compared to other people and reasonable points can win you.

Pitch Report
If you want to win consistently, then  you should definitely know about the pitch report before the match because by learning about the pitch report, you can predict whether the bowlers will be effective on this pitch. Then according to that, you choose the batsmen or bowlers and choose the captain and vice-captain, then see how much benefit you get. So before any match, complete information about the pitch report is given.

Toss
Toss is an essential part of the match, and you can start with a toss to win. Always keep this information about whether the team batting first and after has won or lost on the ground where the match is taking place and collect complete data about it and get complete information.
